description: A mpoaTrapLinkChange trap is generated when
a VSP or ATM link changes operational state.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD AVAYA-MPOA-MIB::mpoaTrapLinkChange AVAYA-MPOA-MIB::mpoaVspId i 1 AVAYA-MPOA-MIB::mpoaLinkId i 9999 AVAYA-MPOA-MIB::mpoaOperState i 1

description: Used in the mpoaTrapLinkChange trap. Index of the VSP
that the trap represents. If the link Id is non-zero
than the vspId is the Id of the VSP associated with the
link whose operational state has changed. If the link
Id is zero, then the vspId represents the VSP whose
variables.name: AVAYA-MPOA-MIB::mpoaVspId

description: Used in the mpoaTrapLinkChange trap. Index of the link
that the trap represents. If the link Id is non-zero
than it is the Id of the link whose operational state has changed.
If the link Id is zero, then it should be ignored.
variables.name: AVAYA-MPOA-MIB::mpoaLinkId

description: This variable gives the operational status
of the link or VSP. The value of initial is used
when the link/VSP was administratively enabled
but the configuration is incorrect, and the
variables.name: AVAYA-MPOA-MIB::mpoaOperState
